perturbation.original_text: Diplomat Ambassador Eyewear Group agrees to comply with the laws and regulations of any state or territory in which they manufacture or have sub-contracted any Kathy Ireland product, especially pertaining to labor and safety issues.
perturbation.changed_text: Diplomat Ambassador Eyewear Group agrees to endeavor to comply with the relevant laws and regulations of any state or territory in which they manufacture or have sub-contracted any Kathy Ireland product, particularly in consideration of labor and safety issues.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates compliance, but the modified text introduces ambiguity. 'Endeavor to comply' weakens the obligation, implying an attempt rather than a guarantee of compliance. 'Relevant' is vague, and 'consideration of' provides no concrete obligation to the safety guidelines. This would violate labor laws requiring strict adherence to safety standards and worker protections.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA), Occupational Safety and Health Act (OSHA)

perturbation.original_text: Diplomat Ambassador Eyewear Group agrees to comply with any reasonable requests from Kathy Ireland, Inc. concerning labor and safety resolutions.
perturbation.changed_text: Diplomat Ambassador Eyewear Group will consider any requests from Kathy Ireland, Inc. concerning labor and safety resolutions, taking into account business operations.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'agrees to comply' to 'will consider' significantly weakens the obligation. Adding 'taking into account business operations' introduces a loophole allowing Diplomat to disregard requests if they conflict with their business interests. This creates ambiguity and potentially contradicts the requirement to maintain safe working conditions and fair labor practices, effectively making worker safety secondary to profit.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA), Occupational Safety and Health Act (OSHA)

perturbation.original_text: Diplomat agrees that the products covered by this Agreement shall be of such style, appearance and quality as to be adequate and suited to their exploitation to the best advantage, protection and enhancement of KI's name and the good will pertaining to such name. Diplomat further agrees that (a) such products will be manufactured, sold and distributed in accordance with all applicable Federal, State and local laws
perturbation.changed_text: Diplomat agrees that the products covered by this Agreement shall be of such style, appearance and quality as deemed appropriate for their exploitation to the best advantage, protection, and enhancement of KI's name and the good will pertaining to such name. Diplomat will attempt to ensure that (a) such products are manufactured, sold, and distributed considering applicable Federal, State, and local laws.
perturbation.explanation: Original text imposes explicit quality standards and adherence to applicable laws. The modified version introduces ambiguity. Replacing 'as to be adequate and suited' with 'as deemed appropriate' makes the standard subjective. Changing 'will be manufactured...in accordance with' to 'will attempt to ensure...considering' weakens the commitment to legal compliance, potentially violating consumer protection and product safety laws.
